import React from 'react' import LeftSidebar from '../../components/LeftSidebar/LeftSidebar' import Avtar from '../../components/Avtar/Avtar' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faBirthdayCake} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import moment from 'moment' const UserProfile = () => { const {id}=useParams() const users =useSelector((state)=>state.usersReducer) const currentProfile = users.filter((user)=>user._id===id)[0] const currentUser = useSelector((state)=>state.currentReducer) return (
{currentProfile?.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{currentProfile?.name}

Member For{moment(currentProfile?.time.fromNow())}

) } export default UserProfile
